65669.summary: Some customers in the The Grange area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65669.title: Aug 17 - Edmonton (The Grange) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
